'''Larry''' is a health inspector, who dates Phoebe in [[The One Where Ross Moves In]]. He closes down almost every restaurant they eat in because it violates the rules, leading to problems with Phoebe when he wants to close [[Central Perk]], which he instead just gives a warning. He's never seen again afterwards.
